org.apache.solr.cloud

Interface OverseerTaskProcessor.OverseerMessageHandlerSelector

  • Enclosing class:
    OverseerTaskProcessor

    public static interface OverseerTaskProcessor.OverseerMessageHandlerSelector
    An interface to determine which OverseerMessageHandler handles a given message. This could be a single OverseerMessageHandler for the case where a single type of message is handled (e.g. collection messages only) , or a different handler could be selected based on the contents of the message.
